name: reflection room
description:
reflection room is an experimental project to explore the impact of changing light and shadow - how does it influence you, does it calm you down, does it inspire, give you energy..?...and it is simply a relaxing way to play with black and white, with movement, digital mirrors, lenses, distortion and perspective. the works are based on painted or photographed flowers which i animated. i'm very interrested in every aspect and tranformation of flowers and as a photographers light and shadow always is a big part of the work. so reflection room is an inner space to think about this, a room with digital tools to play with reflection and in the result a virtual square to show you the results.
first work in this project is "floating bamboo"  (#297953), here comes the second video.
video 1530x1530px
